Event.name: Rescuing
Event.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> saves a <fen>Patient</fen> or an <fen>Asset</fen> from a <fen>Harmful_situation</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Agent">Israeli commandos</fex> <t>rescued</t> <fex name="Patient">the hostages</fex> and left.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Agent">His German shepherd</fex> <t>saved</t> <fex name="Patient">him</fex> <fex name="Harm">from drowing</fex> once.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Agent">She</fex> <t>saved</t> <fex name="Asset">my life</fex> <fex name="Place">on the bridge</fex> <fex name="Time">yesterday</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Agent
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The sentient being who rescues the <fen>Patient</fen> or <fen>Asset</fen> from the <fen>Harmful_situation</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Agent">He</fex> <t>rescued</t> the innocent girl from a fate worse than death. </ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Patient
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The living being who is rescued by the <fen>Agent</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Patient">Three foxes</fex> were <t>saved</t> from being savagely ripped apart.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Asset
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The entity that is judged to be valueable which might be lost or damaged by the <fen>Harmful_situation</fen>.
<ex>She <t>saved</t> <fex name="Asset">countless lives</fex> during her short stay on the plantation.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Harmful_situation
Arg.definition:
<def-root>An event that occurs which could result in injury or harm to the <fen>Patient</fen> or <fen>Asset</fen>.
<ex>Three foxes were <t>saved</t> <fex name="Harm">from being savagely ripped apart</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The time at which the <fen>Agent</fen> rescues the <fen>Patient</fen> or <fen>Asset</fen>.
<ex>She <t>saved</t> my life on the bridge <fex name="Time">yesterday</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The way in which the <fen>Agent</fen> rescues the <fen>Patient</fen> or <fen>Asset</fen>.
<ex>Kevin informed her that he would <fex name="Manner">happily</fex> <t>save</t> her, given the opportunity.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The location at which the <fen>Agent</fen> rescues the <fen>Patient</fen> or <fen>Asset</fen>.
<ex>She <t>saved</t> my life <fex name="Place">on the bridge</fex> yesterday.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Circumstances
Arg.definition: <def-root>The setting in which the rescuing act takes place. </def-root>

Arg.name: Instrument
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The tool with which the <fen>Agent</fen> saves the <fen>Patient</fen> or <fen>Asset</fen>.
<ex>She <t>saved</t> my life <fex name="Instrument">with her words</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The means by which the <fen>Agent</fen> rescues the <fen>Patient</fen> or <fen>Asset</fen>.
<ex>The nurse <t>saved</t> my life <fex name="Means">by performing CPR</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The purpose for which the <fen>Agent</fen> rescues the <fen>Patient</fen> or <fen>Asset</fen>.
<ex>You know he only <t>saved</t> the dog <fex name="Purpose">to get close to Miranda</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition: <def-root>A state of affairs that the <fen>Agent</fen> is responding to in performing the action.</def-root>

Arg.name: Degree
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The extent to which the <fen>Patient</fen> or <fen>Asset</fen> is actually saved.
<ex>He <fex name="Degree">wholly</fex> <t>saved</t> the town from hunger.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: rescue.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to save someone or something from a dangerous situation

lexUnit.name: save.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to rescue someone or something from potential harm or danger
